item.title: Beyonce is Everything
item.description:
Please support me by signing up for Nebula- http://go.nebula.tv/fdsignifier
Watch my new short documentary "Talking to 'White' People" here - https://nebula.tv/videos/fdsignifier-talking-to-white-people
Watch my Nebula original on the Boondocks here--- https://nebula.tv/videos/workingtitle...
Watch my Vaulted video on Tupac - https://nebula.tv/videos/signifiedbsi...
Edited by @BABILA. Assistant edits by @RealSpacial
Special thanks to @TeeNoir @herbyxrevolus @KhadijaMbowe @ismatu.gwendolyn
00:00 An Artist's Duty is... 01:48 Intro 08:54 Beyonce 46:42 The Chaos Machine 01:02:20 Badyonce 01:14:37 This Means WAR 01:53:28 ... To Reflect the Times
Ismatu's Essays - https://www.threadings.io/the-mythical-black-artist-2/
Videos about Beyonce -
Herby - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V_YpXIPFp0s&t=1719s&pp=ygUVaGVyYnkgcmV2b2x1cyBiZXlvbmNl
Tee Noir - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=99W79ED4hCE&t=19s&pp=ygUQVGVlIE5vaXIgYmV5b25jZQ%3D%3D
Khadija Mbowe - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o8isSOHI1oU&pp=ygUVa2hhZGlqYSBtYm93ZSBiZXlvbmNl
